item.title: Smart Join Algorithms for Fighting Skew at Scale
About Me
item.description: Hi, I’m Tushar. I’m a senior data scientist at Nielsen in Chicago, IL. I have an interest in human-computer interaction and how technology & new media are affecting our lives. On this site, I write summaries of papers that interest me along with other articles or talks. I can be reached at: Github: tuchandra Email: me [at] tusharc [dot] dev Projects I take pride in identifying problems and building tools to fix them.
